# Week Six Structure

#### Monday

- 9.30: Weekly kickoff workshop & Project Team Reveal

#### Tuesday

- 10.00: Optional workshop (Ruby fundamentals)

#### Wednesday

- Project teams set your own schedule

#### Thursday

- 9.30: Optional workshop (TBC)

#### Friday

- 16.00: Retro planning
- 17.00: Individual group retros
